entry.title: RT buzea200: First @SolanaUni ambassador and now @devdaowomen hackathon scholarship lead 👏🤩 Both achievements in the last 2 weeks. @scarlett_spa...
entry.summary:
RT buzea200 First @SolanaUni ambassador and now @devdaowomen hackathon scholarship lead 👏🤩 Both achievements in the last 2 weeks. @scarlett_spade is raising the bar. Congratulations, Scarlett! Well deserved!
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): 🎉 Exciting news! 🎉 We are thrilled to announce that @scarlett_spade will be leading the @devdaowomen hackathon scholarship program! With her passion and commitment to empowering women, we know she'll do an amazing job. Stay tuned for more updates! https://t.co/I8MTXU1QB7

entry.summary:
Re 𝗪𝗲𝗹𝗹𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗛𝘂𝗯 A dedicated space for DAO members to discuss mental health and wellness. Hosted by @emmbodiment — we have support/guidance sessions that run bi-weekly (every 2 weeks), and we’d love for you to join us 💚
community @ dd: 𝗪𝗘𝗟𝗟𝗡𝗘𝗦𝗦 𝗛𝗨𝗕 🍵 Every 2 weeks, beginning 𝟭𝟯𝘁𝗵 𝗙𝗲𝗯𝗿𝘂𝗮𝗿𝘆 — the Wellness Team will host a 60min support/guidance session in Discord: covering topics such as burnout, imposter syndrome, work-life balance, and more. Feel free to stop by 💚 https://t.co/mXAQ5N0cdt

entry.summary:

Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): The 𝗗𝗗 𝗟𝗮𝗯𝘀 section is officially live in Discord ✅ It is comprised of forum-based channels — and over time, tasks and roles under DD Labs will be shared as forum posts. DAO members can then asks teams clarifying questions, and easily obtain context inside each post! ☺️ https://t.co/KTZ0yyv8uy

entry.summary:
Re 𝗗𝗗 𝗟𝗮𝗯𝘀 As cited in the thread below, there was a need to move all operational teams into a new Discord, and retrofit Developer DAO’s server to prioritize 𝗻𝗼𝗻-𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹 members as a default. Doing so, has drastically helped to reduce the size of our server https://t.co/sHkvxuB6MJ

entry.title: Re 𝗥𝗲𝗱𝘂𝗰𝗲𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝗳𝗮𝘂𝗹𝘁 𝗩𝗶𝗲𝘄 Many of you left feedback that Developer DAO’s server was disorganized ...
entry.summary:
Re 𝗥𝗲𝗱𝘂𝗰𝗲𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝗳𝗮𝘂𝗹𝘁 𝗩𝗶𝗲𝘄 Many of you left feedback that Developer DAO’s server was disorganized and overwhelming 😰 And at one point, we even reached Discord’s limit of 500 channels 🤯 The default view has since been drastically cut down to only 6 categories ☺️ 🙏
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): “Our team spent over 10 months reducing the number of channels down from 500 — by deleting the excess and consolidating entire sections. All with minimal friction/disruption to the member experience.” — Luan @boyluan https://t.co/3tQbKgDy37

entry.summary:
